languages.text: Используйте {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}металлолом{/g}, чтобы отремонтировать корабль и восстановить {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}целостность корпуса{/g} судна. Вы можете обнаружить металлолом во время исследования звездных систем, получить после некоторых космобоев или приобрести этот ресурс у торговцев разных фракций.

Use {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.
languages.original_text: Используйте {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}металлолом{/g}, чтобы отремонтировать корабль и восстановить {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}целостность корпуса{/g} судна. Вы можете обнаружить металлолом во время исследования звездных систем, получить после некоторых космобоев или приобрести этот ресурс у торговцев разных фракций.

traits.locale_text: Use scrap to repair your ship and restore its hull integrity. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

Use scrap to repair your ship and restore its hull integrity. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

Use scrap to repair your ship and restore its hull integrity. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

Use {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

languages.text: Usa {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}chatarra{/g} para reparar la nave y restaurar su {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}integridad de casco{/g}. Puedes encontrar chatarra al explorar sistemas estelares, conseguirla tras algunas batallas espaciales o comprársela a los mercaderes afiliados con diversas facciones.
languages.original_text: Use {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

traits.locale_text: Usa {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}chatarra{/g} para reparar la nave y restaurar su {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}integridad de casco{/g}. Puedes encontrar chatarra al explorar sistemas estelares, conseguirla tras algunas batallas espaciales o comprársela a los mercaderes afiliados con diversas facciones.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}スクラップ{/g}を使って船を修理し、{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体の完全性{/g}を回復する。スクラップは星系を探索して見つけたり、特定の宇宙戦闘の後に集めたり、各勢力に所属する商人から購入したりできる。
languages.original_text: Use {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}スクラップ{/g}を使って船を修理し、{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体の完全性{/g}を回復する。スクラップは星系を探索して見つけたり、特定の宇宙戦闘の後に集めたり、各勢力に所属する商人から購入したりできる。

languages.text: 您可以使用{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}废料{/g}修复舰船，恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体完整度{/g}。废料可以在探索星系的时候发现，也可以从太空战斗中收集，或是从隶属于各个派系的商人那里购买。
languages.original_text: Use {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

traits.locale_text: 您可以使用{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}废料{/g}修复舰船，恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体完整度{/g}。废料可以在探索星系的时候发现，也可以从太空战斗中收集，或是从隶属于各个派系的商人那里购买。

languages.text: Verwende {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}Schrott{/g}, um dein Schiff zu reparieren und seine {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpfintegrität{/g} wiederherzustellen. Schrott kannst du bei der Erkundung von Sternensystemen finden, nach bestimmten Raumschlachten einsammeln oder bei Händlern der verschiedenen Fraktionen kaufen.
languages.original_text: Use {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.

traits.locale_text: Verwende {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}Schrott{/g}, um dein Schiff zu reparieren und seine {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpfintegrität{/g} wiederherzustellen. Schrott kannst du bei der Erkundung von Sternensystemen finden, nach bestimmten Raumschlachten einsammeln oder bei Händlern der verschiedenen Fraktionen kaufen.

languages.text: Utilisez des {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}pièces de récupération{/g} pour réparer votre vaisseau et rétablir l'{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}intégrité de sa coque{/g}. Les pièces de récupération peuvent être trouvées lors de l'exploration des systèmes stellaires, récupérées après certaines batailles spatiales ou achetées auprès de marchands affiliés à diverses factions.
languages.original_text: Use {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}. Scrap can be found while exploring star systems, collected after certain space battles, or purchased from merchants affiliated with various factions.
